problem.markdown:
>>In Blueberry dispensary, were the total number of Malaria RDT positives greater than or less than the total number of Malaria RDT’s performed?<< [[(greater than), less than]]
[explanation] The correct answer is greater than [explanation] --- >>In Chocolate Dispensary, how many Malaria RDT’s were positive in Oct - Dec 2016 for the 'under 5 years' age group? (enter the value in the box below)<< = 14
[explanation] 14 Malaria RDT’s were positive in Oct - Dec 2016 for the 'under 5 years' age group within Chocolate Dispensary [explanation]
problem.p: In Blueberry dispensary, were the total number of Malaria RDT positives greater than or less than the total number of Malaria RDT’s performed?

optioninput.label: In Blueberry dispensary, were the total number of Malaria RDT positives greater than or less than the total number of Malaria RDT’s performed?

div.p: The correct answer is greater than

problem.p: In Chocolate Dispensary, how many Malaria RDT’s were positive in Oct - Dec 2016 for the 'under 5 years' age group? (enter the value in the box below)

formulaequationinput.label: In Chocolate Dispensary, how many Malaria RDT’s were positive in Oct - Dec 2016 for the 'under 5 years' age group? (enter the value in the box below)

div.p: 14 Malaria RDT’s were positive in Oct - Dec 2016 for the 'under 5 years' age group within Chocolate Dispensary
